title: French Kiss
description: She must to be at his beck and call.Still, Sofia struggles with her new reality.Will she accept Bryce’s latest demands?Bryce isn’t leaving New York without Sofia.She has to decide if she’s willing to submit to his latest demand.She knew what she had signed-up for when she accepted the terms of her new career.But is she really supposed to jump when he says, jump?She was once a queen… she’s not a subject.How humbling.How crushing.Sofia’s naughty arrangement becomes a little more complicated... especially when Bryce does his best to fully dominate her.She needs to keep it together… she has to.But Bryce is a determined man?And she’s no match for him.Will she unravel little by little and succumb to his domineering ways?This is Part 2 of 4 of a perfect getaway filled with passion, steam and a twisty storyline that will keep you riveted until the fairytale ending!Get it now.
author: Scarlett Avery
